title: morning_moisture_observation_in_vegetable_plot
summary: Photo record of morning moisture conditions in the vegetable plot.
description: This data unit records the observed morning moisture condition in the vegetable plot at MaMeeFarm. The evidence is a photo captured during the morning period showing soil and plant conditions in the plot.

reference_context.context_note: Nearby environmental reference from duck house temperature and humidity record.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
